thread.title: People Think Melania Trump Is Literally Flinching at Donald Trump's Touch in This Video
thread.title_full: People Think Melania Trump Is Literally Flinching at Donald Trump's Touch in This Video

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: People Think Melania Trump Is Literally Flinching at Donald Trump's Touch in This Video
text:
During President Donald Trump's campaign rally Saturday, first lady Melania Trump made a rare speaking appearance , leading the crowd in prayer before delivering a speech of her own.
In a video recovered from the event, you can see that before Melania Trump began the Lord's Prayer, Donald Trump came over and touched her on the arm. As he does so, Melania Trump seems to flinch and look away before saying "thank you" and moving on ‚Äî around the 11 second mark in the video below:
 . @FLOTUS opens her remarks with the Lord's Prayer. pic.twitter.com/z0Vk6znjL8
‚Äî Fox News (@FoxNews) February 18, 2017 It's a moment that has reminded many of Inauguration Day, when Melania Trump was caught looking similarly unhappy with Donald Trump:
pic.twitter.com/IDrGPkJQSl
‚Äî Marv (@Marv_Vien) January 23, 2017 While it's been established that Melania Trump is a grown woman who has power and autonomy ( no need to #FreeMelania , guys), this video has still caught the eye of some people on Twitter because, as Ursula the Sea Witch once noted, don't ever underestimate the importance of body language :
The flinch at 14 seconds is mesmerizing. https://t.co/RNeaF0wB4T
‚Äî James Brennan (@Denver_Brennan) February 21, 2017 @TheDweck It's a warning squeeze. I'd venture to guess he doesn't like her getting more cheers than him.
‚Äî Meg Bee (@oneretrocupcake) February 19, 2017 @TheDweck @pattonoswalt That speaks volumes.
‚Äî LalaLand1776 üêòüíñüêò (@Mamabear0772) February 19, 2017 Literally even the slightest touch by @realDonaldTrump makes #melaniatrump flinch. #ColdAsIce #TrumpRally pic.twitter.com/wYsn1WV2dQ
‚Äî Waqas Ali (@Waqas_Ali_) February 20, 2017 But was Melania Trump actually flinching away from the touch of her husband? Was she simply startled by the gesture? Was she unhappy, perhaps, that he was giving her a hint to get a move on with her prayer when she was reveling in the applause?! Who knows? Some mysteries aren't meant to be solved.
